          <title>
            <string language="en">The pairing of halogen atoms</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Paarung der Halogenatome</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">L'appareillement des atomes d'halogène</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Emparelhar-se de átomos do halogênio</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Accoppiamento degli atomi dell'alogeno</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η ένωση των ατόμων αλόγονου</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El emparejar de los átomos del halógeno</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows that halogen atoms are joined together in pairs.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">bromine</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">chlorine</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">fluorine</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">halogens</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">iodine</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">molecular structure</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">molecules</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt, daß die Halogenatome 
zusammen Paare angeschlossen werden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration prouve que des atomes 
d'halogène sont associés ensemble aux paires.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra que os átomos do 
halogênio estão juntados junto em pares.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione indica che gli atomi 
dell'alogeno si associano insieme agli accoppiamenti.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση δείχνει ότι τα άτομα αλόγονου 
ενώνονται μαζί ανά τα ζευγάρια.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra que los átomos del 
halógeno están ensamblados juntos en pares.</string>
          </description>
